nodes.text: The Model 6 modular backpack, also known as the "Mule" modular backpack, was a model of modular backpack produced by the Adventure Hiker and Hunter company. Available after the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire, the backpack cost 50.
The Model 6 modular backpack was first mentioned in the Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2014.
